description: best soft for safe your files
TrueCrypt successor. Usage for encrypted virtual disk without any issues. No missing features. It works as expected.

This is essentially a TrueCrypt fork created after TrueCrypt ceased development. It's a powerful and fairly friendly way to created encrypted containers. These containers, while existing as a single file on your machine, are decrypted through the program and accessed as if they were just another disk attached to your machine. If you can handle using a flash drive, you can probably handle VeraCrypt!
Feels just like Truecrypt and works just as easily. Highly recommended.
I have been using this for years. Thank you!
summary: great app to safeguard sensitive info like passwords

description: My move to Ubuntu has been smooth because of this application. Sweet!

many options of what exactly to encrypt. Easy to hide the fact that you've encrypted this or that. a bit hard to remember in what order to do things. but, a must have for flash drives, i think. Just be sure to keep directions for it on an encrypted email (attached document) in either protonmail or tutanota or some similar secure email account.
Been using this safe app for a long time to safekeep my "stuff".
This is the best app for securing sensitive data. All of my important documents and family pictures are stored inside a secure, impenetrable container.
summary: Best app for secure, tight encryption

description: Eines der besten Programme der Welt
